dcterms:description: This dataset contains EEG data recorded from 9 subjects performing four different motor imagery tasks, with 22 channels recorded at a sampling rate of 250 Hz. The data is divided into two sessions, one labeled and one used as the target domain.
dcterms:title: BCI Competition IV Dataset 2a

dcterms:creator: X.-C. Zhong
Q. Wang
D. Liu
J.-X. Liao
R. Yang
S. Duan
G. Ding
J. Sun
dcterms:description: This dataset consists of EEG data from 9 subjects recorded at 250 Hz from 3 channels. The data includes five sessions, with the first three sessions labeled and the last two used as the target domain for classification.
dcterms:title: BCI Competition IV Dataset 2b

dcterms:description: A simulative dataset created for the experiments in this paper, designed to validate the proposed EEG-DG framework.
dcterms:title: Simulative Dataset
